Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME:RKM PeopleSoft MSSQL COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse-engineering knowledge module to retrieve the business objects, tables, views, columns, Keys, and Foreign keys from PeopleSoft
Restrictions : - This knowledge module works only for PeopleSoft on Microsoft SQL Server. - The Mask of tables to reverse is not mandatory. - The Mask of the Option Business Object to reverse should not be empty. - The Selective Reverse tab cannot be used with this knowledge module.

The Business Object is corresponding to the PeopleSoft "Object Owner ID" You will find the differents Object Owner ID in the PeopleSoft view : EO_BCOWNRID_VW The Object Owner ID of some tables are not in this view, so we reverse them in the "NA" Business Object.

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_CATALOG, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'U', :SCHEMA_NAME, :CATALOG_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1' )

select DISTINCT A.RECNAME AS TABLE_NAME, 'FK_'+A.RECNAME+'_'+A.EDITTABLE AS FK_NAME, A.EDITTABLE AS PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' AS SCHEMA_NAME, '<%=snpRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' AS CATALOG_NAME FROM
<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECFIELDDB","D")%> A, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB WHERE A.USEEDIT & 16384 > 0 and REC.RECNAME = A.RECNAME and (REC.RECTYPE <2) and (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'

select DISTINCT ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') as SMOD_CODE, CASE WHEN M.OBJECTOWNERID IS NULL THEN 'NA' ELSE M.OBJECTOWNERID+'-'+XLATLONGNAME END as SMOD_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB where (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and REC.RECTYPE <2 and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW,SMOD_CODE) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1',:SMOD_CODE)

select REC.RECNAME as TABLE_NAME, 'T' as TABLE_TYPE, TAB.TABLE_NAME as RES_NAME, rtrim(REC.RECDESCR) as TABLE_DESC, CASE WHEN len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')> 0 and substring(REC.RECNAME,1,len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')) = '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>' THEN substring(REC.RECNAME,len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')+1,35) ELSE substring(REC.RECNAME,1,35) END as TABLE_ALIAS, ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') as SMOD_CODE from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB where (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and REC.RECTYPE =0 and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW,SMOD_CODE) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1',:SMOD_CODE)

select REC.RECNAME as TABLE_NAME, 'T' as TABLE_TYPE, TAB.TABLE_NAME as RES_NAME, rtrim(REC.RECDESCR) as TABLE_DESC, CASE WHEN len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')> 0 and substring(REC.RECNAME,1,len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')) = '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>' THEN substring(REC.RECNAME,len('<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>')+1,35) ELSE substring(REC.RECNAME,1,35) END as TABLE_ALIAS, ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') as SMOD_CODE from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB where (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and REC.RECTYPE =1 and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC,COL_HEADING, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, DEF_VALUE) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :COL_HEADING, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1', :DEF_VALUE)

SELECT REC.RECNAME AS TABLE_NAME, C.COLUMN_NAME AS COL_NAME, C.DATA_TYPE AS DT_DRIVER, C.ORDINAL_POSITION AS POS, CASE WHEN B.FIELDTYPE = 2 OR B.FIELDTYPE = 3 THEN C.NUMERIC_PRECISION ELSE C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH END AS LONGC, NUMERIC_SCALE AS SCALEC, D.LONGNAME AS COL_HEADING, rtrim(D.LONGNAME)+' '+cast(isnull(B.DESCRLONG,' ') as VARCHAR(150) ) as COL_DESC, CASE WHEN C.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as COL_MANDATORY , CASE WHEN A.DEFRECNAME = '' THEN A.DEFFIELDNAME ELSE '' END AS DEF_VALUE FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on (REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECFIELDDB","D")%> A, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSDBFIELD","D")%> B, INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSDBFLDLABL","D")%> D WHERE (REC.RECNAME = C.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME = C.TABLE_NAME) and (REC.RECTYPE =0 or REC.RECTYPE =1) and REC.RECNAME = A.RECNAME and A.FIELDNAME = B.FIELDNAME and A.FIELDNAME = D.FIELDNAME and COLUMN_NAME = A.FIELDNAME and DEFAULT_LABEL=1 and C.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, 'PK', '1', '1', '1' )

SELECT DISTINCT A.RECNAME as TABLE_NAME, 'PK_'+A.RECNAME as KEY_NAME FROM
<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECFIELD","D")%> A, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB WHERE A.USEEDIT & 1 > 0 and REC.RECNAME = A.RECNAME and (REC.RECTYPE =0) and (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

SELECT A.RECNAME as TABLE_NAME, 'PK_'+A.RECNAME as KEY_NAME, A.FIELDNAME as COL_NAME, A.FIELDNUM as POS FROM
<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECFIELD","D")%> A, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB WHERE A.USEEDIT & 1 > 0 and REC.RECNAME = A.RECNAME and (REC.RECTYPE =0) and (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( I_MOD, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) Values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select A.RECNAME AS FK_TABLE_NAME, 'FK_'+A.RECNAME+'_'+A.EDITTABLE AS FK_NAME, A.EDITTABLE AS PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' AS SCHEMA_NAME, '<%=snpRef.getModel("CATALOG_NAME")%>' AS CATALOG_NAME, A.FIELDNAME AS FK_COL_NAME, A.FIELDNAME AS PK_COL_NAME, A.FIELDNUM AS POS FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECFIELDDB","D")%> A, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PSRECDEFN","D")%> REC left outer join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "PS_EO_BCOWNRID_VW","D")%> M on ( REC.OBJECTOWNERID=M.OBJECTOWNERID), INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES TAB WHERE A.USEEDIT & 16384 > 0 and REC.RECNAME = A.RECNAME and (REC.RECTYPE <2) and (REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME or 'PS_'+REC.RECNAME =TAB.TABLE_NAME) and TAB.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ISNULL(M.OBJECTOWNERID,'NA') like '<%=odiRef.getOption("Business Object")%>'
